name: StatusBar
description: Global manager for showing messages to users through the status bar

methods.name: success
methods.description: Shows a green message in the status bar. Should only be used for positive events that users would like to see.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Shows a white message in the status bar. Best for general information, and other messages that aren't vital.

methods.name: warn
methods.description: Shows an orange message in the status bar. Should only be used when the user needs to see it and should contain actionable advice.
